TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AttributeUsageAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AttributeUsageAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AttributeUsageAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定另一个属性类的用法。

span.span: Specifies the usage of another attribute class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你正在定义您自己的属性类时，您可以控制它使用放置的方式属性类。When you are defining your own attribute class, you can control the manner in which it is used by placing an on your attribute class. 指示的特性类必须派生自，直接或间接。The indicated attribute class must derive from , either directly or indirectly. 属性类具有定位和命名参数。Attribute classes have positional and named parameters. 每个特性类的公共构造函数定义为该类的位置参数的有效序列。Each public constructor for an attribute class defines a valid sequence of positional parameters for that class. 命名的参数由非静态、 公共和读写的字段或属性类的属性定义。Named parameters are defined by the non-static, public, and read-write fields or properties of the attribute class. 三个属性设置通过定义以下参数：The three properties of are set by defining the following parameters: - 此位置的参数指定可以置于所指示的特性的程序元素。This positional parameter specifies the program elements that the indicated attribute can be placed on. 中列出了你可以将属性置于的所有可能的元素的集枚举。The set of all possible elements that you can place an attribute on is listed in the enumeration. 你可以组合若干个值使用按位或运算获取有效的程序元素所需的组合。You can combine several values using a bitwise OR operation to get the desired combination of valid program elements. - 此命名的参数指定是否可以为一个给定的程序元素多次指定所指示的特性。This named parameter specifies whether the indicated attribute can be specified more than once for a given program element. - 此命名的参数指定是否可以由派生的类和重写成员继承所指示的特性。This named parameter specifies whether the indicated attribute can be inherited by derived classes and overriding members. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅和[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see and [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.AttributeTargets validOn) cil managed

param.name: validOn
param.span: 使用按位"或"运算符组合的一组值，用于指示哪些程序元素是有效的。

span.span: The set of values combined using a bitwise OR operation to indicate which program elements are valid.

summary.span: 用指定的 、 值和 值列表初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified list of , the value, and the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以组合若干个值使用按位或运算获取有效的程序元素所需的组合。You can combine several values using a bitwise OR operation to get the desired combination of valid program elements. 默认属性值，请参阅， ，和属性。For default property values, see the , , and properties. ## Examples DispId 属性的定义演示如何使用按位 OR 运算组合几个值。The definition of the DispId attribute illustrates the use of a bitwise OR operation to combine several values. [!code-cpp[Classic AttributeUsageAttribute.AttributeUsageAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic AttributeUsageAttribute.AttributeUsageAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic AttributeUsageAttribute.AttributeUsageAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic AttributeUsageAttribute.AttributeUsageAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic AttributeUsageAttribute.AttributeUsageAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic AttributeUsageAttribute.AttributeUsageAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowMultiple { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示能否为一个程序元素指定多个指示属性实例。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether more than one instance of the indicated attribute can be specified for a single program element.

value.span: 如果允许指定多个实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if more than one instance is allowed to be specified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以多次指定一个程序元素的属性称为多用途特性。An attribute that can be specified more than once for a program element is called a multi-use attribute. 只能指定一次的属性称为单用途特性。An attribute that can be specified only once is called a single-use attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Inherited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值确定指示的属性是否由派生类和重写成员继承。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the indicated attribute is inherited by derived classes and overriding members.

value.span: 如果该属性可以由派生类和重写成员继承，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute can be inherited by derived classes and overriding members; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定：The property determines: - 从基类派生的类是否使用到的属性标记应用特性继承该属性。Whether classes derived from a base class tagged with the attribute to which the attribute is applied inherit that attribute. - 使用向其属性是否派生类重写基类方法的方法标记应用特性继承该属性。Whether methods of derived classes that override a base class method tagged with the attribute to which the attribute is applied inherit that attribute. （如果一个类继承的基类成员，它还继承任何属性应用于该成员。）(If a class inherits a base class member, it also inherits any attributes applied to that member.) ## Examples 下面的示例演示与其属性之间的差异特性与属性值`true`应用和一个到特性与属性值`false`应用。The following example illustrates the difference between an attribute to which an attribute with an property value of `true` is applied and one to which attribute with an property value of `false` is applied . 该示例定义两个属性，`InheritedAttribute`和`NotInheritedAttribute`。The example defines two attributes, `InheritedAttribute` and `NotInheritedAttribute`. 这两个属性可以将应用于类和方法。Both attributes can apply to classes and methods. 因为属性应用于属性`InheritedAttribute`是`true`、 它由派生类中继承和派生重写基类方法的类的成员。Because the property of the attribute applied to `InheritedAttribute` is `true`, it is inherited by derived classes and the members of derived classes that override the base class method. 另一方面，因为属性应用于属性`NotInheritedAttribute`是`false`它不由派生类继承，派生重写基类方法的类的成员。On the other hand, because the property of the attribute applied to `NotInheritedAttribute` is `false`, it is not inherited by derived classes and the members of derived classes that override the base class method. [!code-csharp[System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited/cs/Inherited1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited/vb/Inherited1.vb#1)] 然后，该示例定义两个基类，这些类。The example then defines two base classes. 首先， `BaseA`，具有一个方法， `MethodA`。The first, `BaseA`, has a single method, `MethodA`. 第二个， `BaseB`，具有一个方法， `MethodB`。The second, `BaseB`, has a single method, `MethodB`. `BaseA` 和`MethodA`都标记有`InheritedAttribute`属性，和`BaseB`和`MethodB`都标记有`NotInheritedAttribute`属性。`BaseA` and `MethodA` are tagged with the `InheritedAttribute` attribute, and `BaseB` and `MethodB` are tagged with the `NotInheritedAttribute` attribute. `DerivedA` 继承自`BaseA`并重写其`MethodA`方法。`DerivedA` inherits from `BaseA` and overrides its `MethodA` method. `DerivedB` 继承自`BaseB`并重写其`MethodB`方法。`DerivedB` inherits from `BaseB` and overrides its `MethodB` method. [!code-csharp[System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited/cs/Inherited1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.AttributeUsageAttribute.Inherited/vb/Inherited1.vb#2)] 如示例所示，输出`DerivedA`和`DerivedA.MethodA`继承`InheritedAttribute`属性，但`DerivedB`和`DerivedB.MethodB`不会继承`NotInheritedAttribute`属性。As the output from the example shows, `DerivedA` and `DerivedA.MethodA` inherit the `InheritedAttribute` attribute, but `DerivedB` and `DerivedB.MethodB` do not inherit the `NotInheritedAttribute` attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValidOn As AttributeTargets
public: property AttributeTargets ValidOn { AttributeTargets get(); };

summary.span: 获取一组值，这组值标识指示的属性可应用到的程序元素。

span.span: Gets a set of values identifying which program elements that the indicated attribute can be applied to.
